name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
title: Gorou: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
inPlayDescription: When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Gorou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Gorou, equip this card.After Gorou equips this card, immediately use Inuzaka All-Round Defense once.When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)(You must have Gorou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

Combat Action: When your active character is Gorou, equip this card. After Gorou equips this card, immediately use Inuzaka All-Round Defense once. When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round) (You must have Gorou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
